| Quotation               = So, [[Theodore Sallis (Earth-616)|Man-Thing]]... Meet my '''Dark Riders.''' Look at '''me,''' the girl with a '''monster mentorship''' program.

| HistoryText             = When [[Theodore Sallis (Earth-616)|Ted Sallis]] tried to summon the ruler of [[Limbo (Otherplace)|Limbo]] in order to confront [[Belasco (Earth-616)|Belasco]] about his role in the origin of the [[Man-Thing]], he instead summoned [[Illyana Rasputina (Earth-616)|Magik]], the current ruler of Limbo. She explained that she could free him from the curse of the Man-Thing, but that it would leave the beast mindless and possibly threaten the entire world. Not willing to unleash that, Magik summoned the Dark Riders to help Ted, as the Man-Thing, fight against [[Harriet Bromes (Earth-616)|Harrower]] to regain his power and his home. The Riders successfully staved off the creatures that Harrower summoned to fight them, and watched as she ultimately was lost in the [[Nexus of All Realities]]. What became of the team afterwards is unknown.{{r|X-Men: Curse of the Man-Thing Vol 1 1}}
